member.name: M:Linkar.Commands.DirectFunctions.SendCommand(Linkar.CredentialOptions,System.String,Linkar.Commands.ENVELOPE_FORMAT,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows making different operations, through some templates in standard format (XML, JSON), synchronously only.
member.param: Object that defines the necessary data to access to the Linkar Server: Username, Password, EntryPoint, Language, FreeText.
Content of the operation you want to send.
Indicates in what format you are doing the operation: XML or JSON.
Maximum time in seconds that the client will wait for a response from the server. Default = 0 to wait indefinitely.

member.name: T:Linkar.Commands.Direct.JsonCommands
member.summary: Allows making different operations, through some templates in standard format JSON, synchronously and asynchronously.

member.name: T:Linkar.Commands.Persistent.LinkarClient
member.summary: These functions perform synchronous persistent (establishing permanent session) operations with any kind of output format type.

member.name: P:Linkar.Commands.Persistent.LinkarClient.SessionID
member.summary: SessionID of the connection.

member.name: M:Linkar.Commands.Persistent.LinkarClient.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LinkarClt class.
member.param: Maximum time in seconds that the client will wait for a response from the server. Default = 0 to wait indefinitely. When the receiveTimeout argument is omitted in any operation, the value set here will be applied.

member.name: M:Linkar.Commands.Persistent.LinkarClient.Login(Linkar.CredentialOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the communication with a server allowing making use of the rest of functions until the Close method is executed or the connection with the server gets lost, synchronously only.
member.param: Object that defines the necessary data to access to the Linkar Server: Username, Password, EntryPoint, Language, FreeText.
Free text sent to the database allows management of additional behaviours in SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM, which is called when this parameter is set.
Maximum time in seconds that the client will wait for a response from the server. Default = 0 to wait indefinitely.

member.name: M:Linkar.Commands.Persistent.LinkarClient.Logout(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Closes the communication with the server, that previously has been opened with a Login function, synchronously only.
member.param: Free text sent to the database allows management of additional behaviours in SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM, which is called when this parameter is set.
Maximum time in seconds that the client will wait for a response from the server. Default = 0 to wait indefinitely.

member.param: Content of the operation you want to send.
Indicates in what format you are doing the operation: XML or JSON.

member.name: T:Linkar.Commands.DATAFORMAT_TYPE
member.summary: Output format type for all operations, except Read, New, Update, Select, LkSchemas, LkProperties and GetTable Also The input format type for New, Update and Delete operations.
